quote: The sun never complains about rising every day; so must we rise and shine in our tasks.
Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear. [Quran 2:286]
The secret of getting ahead is getting started. - Mark Twain
The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease forever to be able to do it. - J.M. Barrie
Do not grieve; indeed, Allah is with us. [Quran 9:40]
Dream big, but let your actions be even greater.
It always seems impossible until it’s done. - Nelson Mandela
And He gave you of all that you asked for. If you count Allah’s blessings, you will never be able to number them. [Quran 14:34]
Strength doesn’t come from what you can do; it comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn’t.
Be the change that you wish to see in the world. - Mahatma Gandhi
Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account. [Quran 39:10]
Wisdom begins in wonder. - Socrates
Every day is a chance to write a new story of courage and progress.
And rely upon Allah; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs. [Quran 33:3]
Your potential is endless. Keep striving, and you will redefine what is possible.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today. - Franklin D. Roosevelt
And whoever puts their trust in Allah, then He will suffice him. [Quran 65:3]
Action is the foundational key to all success. - Pablo Picasso
Your hardest times often lead to the greatest moments of your life. Keep going.
When you’ve done everything you can, trust that Allah will do what you cannot.
You are not defined by your failures but by how you rise after falling.
Indeed, the help of Allah is near. [Quran 2:214]
Courage is not having the strength to go on; it is going on when you don’t have the strength. - Theodore Roosevelt
Strive for progress, not perfection, and greatness will follow.
So be patient. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. [Quran 30:60]
Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
He who seeks knowledge is on the path of Allah. - Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)
The best way to predict the future is to create it. - Peter Drucker
Allah is sufficient for us, and He is the best disposer of affairs. [Quran 3:173]
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. - Steve Jobs
A believer never gives up, for every step taken with faith is a step closer to success.
